skill_gap_analysis_agent.name: Skill Gap Analysis Agent
skill_gap_analysis_agent.description: Generates adaptive role-based diagnostic assessments, scores responses using weighted proficiency engine, maps current skills against target role competency frameworks, and classifies gaps

learning_path_agent.name: Learning Path Agent
learning_path_agent.description: Generates personalized adaptive learning journeys based on prioritized skill gaps with courses, certifications, and stretch assignments

internal_mobility_agent.name: Internal Mobility Agent
internal_mobility_agent.description: Scans internal open roles against employee profile, calculates transition readiness scores, and generates upskilling roadmaps for career mobility

training_roi_agent.name: Training ROI Agent
training_roi_agent.description: Measures learning impact on performance, calculates Learning Effectiveness Score, Skill Acquisition Velocity, and Program ROI at employee and organizational level

learning_orchestrator_agent.name: Learning Orchestrator Agent
learning_orchestrator_agent.description: Central intelligence layer that coordinates all employee-facing sub-agents, routes assessment requests, aggregates skill gap analysis with learning paths and mobility data, and returns a unified employee dashboard output

workforce_intelligence_agent.name: Workforce Intelligence Agent
workforce_intelligence_agent.description: Independently queries aggregated Skill Graph data to produce org-wide skill heatmaps, skill distribution, shortage index, readiness funnels, and learning effectiveness analytics

predictive_capability_gap_agent.name: Predictive Capability Gap Agent
predictive_capability_gap_agent.description: Forecasts future skill shortages, identifies capability misalignment with business strategy, runs hiring vs upskilling simulations, and generates workforce readiness projections
